channel.title: How do i add xp on dummies and door when i hit it i want 2 have it like 20k xp
channel.description: how do i add xp in client,java on door and hayballs and dummyes :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 07:30:55 AM[/size][hr]plzzz help me[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 07:36:23 AM[/size][hr]ppppllllzzzz

item.title: How do i add xp on dummies and door when i hit it i want 2 have it like 20k xp
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Open up client.java and then search for

case 1531:

Where it says

addSkillXP((6500*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((12500*playerLevel[18]), 18);

Just change the 6500, 8500 and the 12500 to what u want it to be
(Your exp will be different to mine.)

Then scroll down to u find the other 2 and do the same.

Hope this helped

–udluv2–

Read full topic
